clinical_study.brief_title: Outcomes of Odontoid Fracture in Skeletally Mature Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Outcomes of Odontoid Fracture in Skeletally Mature Patients in Assuit University Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to evaluate and assess the short-term outcomes of odontoid fracture cases admitted to trauma unit of Assiut university hospital.

detailed_description.textblock: patients with completed records, CTs, and Plain radiographs. Sufficient clinical records with documented NDI, The patient will be evaluated in 2 weeks, 6 weeks , and 3 , 6 months post operative .

primary_outcome.measure: Assess the short term outcomes of Odontoid fracture in skeletally mature patients
primary_outcome.description: To use the NDI as assessment tool of outcome

study_pop.textblock: All patient with fracture Odontoid who are more than 18 of age .

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- all skeletally patients with odontoid fractures admitted to Assiut University Hospital - Department of Orthopedics and Trauma between October 2021 and October 2022
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients who are not available for 6 months follow-up and those with insufficient documentation or records
